COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4
STRING: I had no particular plans today, so I left the cafeteria
and decided to head to the practice rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa
STRING: Heading down the hallway, I noticed the figure of
someone go around the corner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110
STRING: [Chris] “I wonder if that was Fal...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x126
STRING: The figure was carrying a very fat envelope that looked
like it was full of papers of some kind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c
STRING: I found myself curious, so I followed the figure that I
thought was Fal, and spoke out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152
STRING: [Chris] “Fal... Is that you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x168
STRING: She turned around upon hearing my voice, and showed
a slightly forced smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e
STRING: For just a fraction of a second, I thought I saw a
troubled expression on her face, but it soon
disappeared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b8
STRING: [Fal] “...Oh, Chris. Hello there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce
STRING: [Chris] “Hi, Fal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x200
STRING: [Fal] “Is something the matter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x216
STRING: [Chris] “No, no... I was just wondering if you were
practicing today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x248
STRING: [Fal] “I kind of have some things I have to do today...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e
STRING: I remembered our conversation from the other day
about her part-time job being in the afternoon, after
she'd practiced a little. But when I asked her about it,
she answered with that same vague smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e
STRING: [Chris] “Things you have to do, you say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b0
STRING: [Fal] “Just some errands.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c6
STRING: [Chris] “But you don't have much time before your shift,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f8
STRING: [Fal] “Not really, I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30e
STRING: Again, that vague and kind of forced smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31a
STRING: [Chris] “You couldn't just say no?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34c
STRING: [Fal] “It was one of the teachers who asked me, and I
thought if I did it immediately, I'd have enough time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36c
STRING: For some reason I had the feeling that this wasn't going
to work out well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x378
STRING: But, even if I were to offer my help, would there be
anything I could do?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x384
STRING: [Chris] “So, uh... What exactly were you asked to do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b6
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, are you going to offer to help?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cc
STRING: [Chris] “Well I don't exactly get asked to do things for
the teachers, so it depends on what is, but... If it's
something I can handle, then yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x408
STRING: [Fal] “Really...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41e
STRING: [Chris] “If I actually can help, that is. So, what do you
have to do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x450
STRING: [Fal] “They want me to write twenty copies of this score
that will be used in class tomorrow. ”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x480
STRING: [Fal] “I've got about two hours until my shift, so I think I
will be able to get it done by myself,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ae
STRING: but I'll probably be pushing it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ba
STRING: She opened the envelope, and grimaced as she
produced the brand new score the teacher gave her,
along with a bundle of blank music sheets.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d0
STRING: If I had to do it, I wouldn't just be pushing it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4dc
STRING: That many pages would be straight up impossible for
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e8
STRING: [Chris] “I'm not exactly great at copying music, but... I'm
sure I can be of some kind of help.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x524
STRING: [Fal] “Really?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x552
STRING: Thank you so much, I really appreciate it!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55e
STRING: [Chris] “But just for the record, I can't guarantee how
much help I will be.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59a
STRING: [Fal] “Even so, it'll be a lot more fun than doing it on my
own.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b0
STRING: [Chris] “That's true. So where will we do this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ce
STRING: [Fal] “Any idea what this is?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e4
STRING: Upon asking that question, she produced something
from her pocket that looked suspiciously like a key.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fa
STRING: There was a small tag tied to the key, with something
written on it in even smaller writing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x610
STRING: [Chris] “What is this key?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62e
STRING: [Fal] “I borrow the key to an empty classroom while I
was at it. There are still classes underway in the other
classrooms, so I figured it'd be quiet and I'd be able to
concentrate.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x658
STRING: [Chris] “Wow, they really trust you, huh... I didn't know
they let students use the keys.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x694
STRING: [Fal] “Well, they only use them for lectures, so it's not
like there's any valuable documents laying about
waiting to be stolen.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b4
STRING: [Chris] “I guess I should expect no less from a former
class president, huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e6
STRING: [Fal] “Hmm, I suppose so. Shall we go?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6fc
STRING: Remembering that time wasn't exactly on our side, Fal
set off down the hallway towards the First Hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x712
STRING: I hurried to follow after her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x762
STRING: [Chris] “It's been a while since I was last here. It kind of
feels new when there's no one here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x782
STRING: In third year there are no compulsory subjects, and
these lecture rooms were only used for lectures of
which attendance was optional.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x798
STRING: And of course, I hadn't been attending.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c8
STRING: [Fal] “It's been that long? You don't take any lectures at
all?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e8
STRING: [Chris] “Well, attendance is optional, after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81a
STRING: [Fal] “Aha-ha.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x848
STRING: I guess since I attend a lot of lectures and come here by
myself, too, it doesn't really feel new at all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x85e
STRING: Fal spread out the bundle of five line music sheets, and
took out her pen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x886
STRING: [Fal] “Do you have any pens on you? I suppose you
don't since you don't attend lectures.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a6
STRING: [Chris] “Hah, sorry to disappoint you, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d0
STRING: I grinned at Fal who looked surprised, and produced a
grimy pen case from the depths of my bag.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e6
STRING: I never used these pens any more, but her comment
reminded that this pen case had been sitting in my bag
since the end of second year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x918
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, I'm impressed! You brought your pens along.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x92e
STRING: [Chris] “Probably more accurate to say I was lazy and
never removed them from my bag.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x960
STRING: [Fal] “...I would have remained impressed if you hadn't
said that, you know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x976
STRING: [Chris] “Honestly, I'm never prepared.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a8
STRING: [Fal] “Aha-ha-ha, that's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9be
STRING: [Chris] “You could disagree, you know...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f0
STRING: [Fal] “Oh Chris, you're so well prepared!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa06
STRING: [Chris] “You don't need to be so blatant...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa38
STRING: [Fal] “...So which should I be, hmm?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa66
STRING: Anyway that doesn't really matter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8a
STRING: I'm glad you brought something, this pen's the only one
I have.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab8
STRING: Okay, I'm going to get started.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad6
STRING: [Fal] “Once I've finished, you can start copying from this
one.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaec
STRING: [Chris] “Sure. I guess I'll just wait, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb0a
STRING: [Fal] “Don't worry, I won't take long.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb20
STRING: By the time she told me this, she had already sat down
and was putting her pen to paper.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb36
STRING: I sat down next to her, and absently watched her go to
work.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb5e
STRING: [Fal] “Hm...? Is something the matter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb74
STRING: She must have noticed my gaze, but she didn't look
away from the page when she spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb8a
STRING: [Chris] “No no, I was just thinking I should get a look at
the score while I wait.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc6
STRING: [Fal] “That might be a good idea.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbdc
STRING: Upon agreeing, she turned the score onto an angle that
made it easier for me to see, and then returned to her
task.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf2
STRING: But, I had to say...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbfe
STRING: She was quite skilled at this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0a
STRING: She finished the first page in no time, and had already
passed it over to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc28
STRING: [Fal] “For the time being, I'll hand you one page at a
time...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc56
STRING: Oh, I guess you must have been bored while you were
waiting. You could have kept talking, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6c
STRING: She was being considerate, but really I was just lost for
words at how quick she was at this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc82
STRING: [Chris] “No, I was just thinking... You're really quick.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb4
STRING: [Fal] “That's because I'm used to it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcca
STRING: She almost seemed to be enjoying herself, and by the
time she finished her sentence, her pen was already
moving again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce8
STRING: [Fal] “I think anyone could do this, once they're used to
it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfe
STRING: [Chris] “I'd probably have given up long before I'd
gotten used to it, though...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd30
STRING: [Fal] “I guess that's possible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd5e
STRING: I've lost count of how many times I've copied scores,
even just in my personal time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd74
STRING: I was doubly surprised at the next page she had just
passed to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd8a
STRING: It was way too neat for something that was supposedly
rushed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd96
STRING: The notes and the symbols, and all the musical
terminology in beautiful flowing writing, were perfect.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdac
STRING: Even I was capable of writing something of this quality,
if I had the luxury of time to do so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc2
STRING: But, to maintain such a level of quality and at that
speed, now that was impossible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdce
STRING: [Chris] “Umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe00
STRING: [Fal] “Ahh, there's no need to rush, you know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe16
STRING: I wasn't really used to talking while I worked, either, so
my responses became a bit delayed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe48
STRING: [Fal] “Hehe...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe76
STRING: I guess talking to you at the same time doesn't help?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe82
STRING: [Chris] “Kind of...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe98
STRING: She must have thought my lack of a proper answer was
funny, as she laughed in response.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeca
STRING: [Fal] “I suppose I'm used to it, when I was a member of
the student board, we always chatted while we worked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeea
STRING: [Chris] “I guess this is the result of me hating this kind of
thing in class.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0a
STRING: On top of that, I was doing my best to copy everything
extra neatly, as this was a request from one of Fal's
teachers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf46
STRING: [Fal] “I really don't mind if you take your time, though.
It's a lot more fun than sitting here in silence. Actually,
I'd even do it all myself if that were the case.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf70
STRING: [Chris] “And so my job would just be to keep you
entertained?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa2
STRING: [Fal] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb8
STRING: [Chris] “I was joking... But, you know I can't just stop
helping you now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff4
STRING: [Fal] “Oh? I really don't mind, either way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100a
STRING: Saying so, she laid out the score she just finished
copying alongside the others, so as not to smear the
ink.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1020
STRING: By the look of things there were a lot of repetitions, and
the score itself was only a few pages long, but a good
section of it had already been completed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x103e
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, moving on, I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1080
STRING: I suppose it had been about an hour since we began.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108c
STRING: I returned to my seat after laying out all of the
completed music sheets across the desks, and realized
we had gone through the entire bundle of sheets.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a2
STRING: [Chris] “Is that everything?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10dc
STRING: [Fal] “Pretty much. It didn't take long at all, thanks to
your help.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10fc
STRING: [Chris] “That's not true, I did like five of the scores at
best...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112e
STRING: [Fal] “But you also kept me entertained.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1144
STRING: She seemed happy to stop me from discrediting myself,
and laid out another sheet of music on the table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115a
STRING: [Chris] “Huh, there's still one more sheet...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118c
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, this? There's just one part left, so I thought I'd
finish it up myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ac
STRING: [Chris] “I'm getting the hang of this now, shall I give you
a hand?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ca
STRING: [Fal] “No, it's fine. If each little part is written by different
people it'll end up being distracting for the reader,
anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ea
STRING: [Chris] “Good point.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1200
STRING: She was completely right, so I didn't try to argue and
just sat myself down and watched her do the last part.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1216
STRING: Since she said she could talk and work at the same
time, I decided to ask her a few questions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122c
STRING: [Chris] “I was wondering, are you really enjoying this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125e
STRING: [Fal] “Hm? Yes, of course!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1274
STRING: [Chris] “You don't find it hard at all?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a6
STRING: [Fal] “Not at all. But, why do you ask?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12bc
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, it's nothing; I was just thinking you're really
amazing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ee
STRING: [Fal] “No, I'm not, really. Besides, I'm just doing what I
was asked to do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130e
STRING: [Chris] “There's plenty of people who aren't capable of
that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1340
STRING: [Fal] “But I am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1356
STRING: [Chris] “After making a lot of effort, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1388
STRING: [Fal] “Effort?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b6
STRING: If it's needed, yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c2
STRING: [Chris] “Why do you go so far to help people?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f4
STRING: [Fal] “I think you might be misunderstanding. I do it for
myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140a
STRING: [Chris] “All of it is just for yourself?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1428
STRING: [Fal] “Maybe it is...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x143e
STRING: [Chris] “Somehow I doubt that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1470
STRING: [Fal] “Oh? Why thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x149a
STRING: I'm not sure why she thanked me in that way, but soon
after she quietly placed her pen on the table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14cc
STRING: [Fal] “Phew... All finished.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e2
STRING: [Chris] “Good job.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1500
STRING: [Fal] “Thanks for your help, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1516
STRING: Looking at the clock on the wall, I realized that Fal still
had some time left before she had to leave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1548
STRING: [Fal] “It really took a lot less time with two hands
instead of one. Thanks again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x155e
STRING: [Chris] “I'm glad I could be of service.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1590
STRING: [Fal] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a6
STRING: Finishing up our work, we gathered up all of the copied
scores and put them in order.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15bc
STRING: Carefully shaking out the last pieces of paper that
hadn't completely dried, we finally finished everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ee
STRING: [Fal] “I really appreciate your help today, I wish I could
do something to thank you more.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160e
STRING: [Chris] “I really didn't do anything that special.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1640
STRING: [Fal] “I had a feeling you'd say that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166e
STRING: In that case, why don't you come to my trattoria?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1684
STRING: [Chris] “The trattoria where you work?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a2
STRING: [Fal] “Yes. If I ask my boss, I'm sure I can treat you to
something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c2
STRING: [Chris] “I couldn't let you do that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16f4
STRING: [Fal] “Really, it wouldn't be anything special.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1722
STRING: Oh, and...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1746
STRING: If I ask about it today, I should be able to take my break
when you come by.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1766
STRING: [Chris] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1798
STRING: [Fal] “So, do you want to come by at night? Or would
the afternoon be better?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c6
STRING: I'm fine either way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d2
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Wha?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1804
STRING: [Fal] “I always start in the afternoon, so mornings
wouldn't work.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x183c
STRING: So, you have to choose.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1848
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... In that case... Night time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1866
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, night time it is, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c2
STRING: Our plan for tomorrow decided, albeit somewhat
forcedly, we headed out into the hallway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18f4
STRING: [Fal] “I have to go and return the key, so wait at the
entrance for me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x191e
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... S-Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1934
STRING: I grinned a little, finding it funny that she could actually
be this forceful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x197c
STRING: We had walked as far as the Old District just like
yesterday, so I decided to confirm the plan for
tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a6
STRING: [Chris] “So, what time should I drop by tomorrow night?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d8
STRING: [Fal] “Oh... You're really going to come?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ee
STRING: [Chris] “Was that all just a joke...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a20
STRING: [Fal] “No, of course not, I was just feeling bad because I
kind of twisted your arm back there. And, you didn't
bring it up on the way back so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a4a
STRING: [Chris] “I thought you were going to keep twisting and
tell me what time you wanted me to be there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a86
STRING: [Fal] “...Hey! I wouldn't do that. But anyway, anytime is
fine, so you could come by at the time you usually eat
dinner if you like.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa6
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, then, how about at around seven?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ad8
STRING: [Fal] “Seven it is, then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b06
STRING: When you come by, I'll make sure to serve you some of
the specials!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b1c
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Will that be okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b4e
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, of course.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b7c
STRING: Well, see you tomorrow!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b88
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, see you then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ba0
STRING: I watched her walk away until she was out of sight, and
it occurred to me that this is something I've been doing
a lot recently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bb6
STRING: That showed how much time we'd been spending
together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc2
STRING: And despite that obvious fact, I was still unable to
decide on who to partner up with, which made me
annoyed at myself.
